DOC.brief_summary: The aim study establish diagnostic predictive biomarkers patient suspect acute stroke , transport EMS candidate thrombolytic treatment . The study focus ultra acute phase , < 4.5 hour symptom onset , include prehospital setting . Analyses include know biomarkers ( e.g . GFAP , NR2 peptide ) discovery phase novel marker . Patient outcome evaluate 3 month use modify Rankin Scale ( mRS ) .
